text: Anthoine Hubert (22 September 1996 â€“ 31 August 2019) was a French professional racing driver. He was born in Lyon and began his kart racing career in 2006 at age nine. In 2018, he became the GP3 Series champion. At the time of his death in 2019, he raced for BWT Arden. On 31 August 2019, Hubert was involved in a crash during the Formula 2 feature race at Circuit de Spa-Francorchamps in Stavelot, Belgium. He died of his injuries a short time later. He was 22. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official site Category:1996 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Formula Two Category:French racecar drivers Category:Road accident deaths Category:Sportspeople from Lyon
title: Anthoine Hubert
